info.name: MangaUpdates Dark v2
info.description: Dark theme for MangaUpdates. Removes most of the unnecessary, busy, and/or bright styling. Works for the new (Feb 2019) site. If a page looks strange when you first load it, refresh.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.9 - Mostly functional, 95% complete.
v1.0 - 99% complete. May be issues in certain scenarios or elements that I could not or can't change.
v1.1 - "Final" version. 99.9% complete. Added re-styled icons, fixed missing styling. Assume any remaining issues are due to the HTML. If something looks a little off, that's because there are re-used HTML elements that cause conflicts in the CSS. If something is obviously not changed from the default styling, take a screenshot and comment.
v1.2 - 99.95%. Call something "final" then proceed to fix several more things...
v1.3 - 99.98%? Added some re-styled icons and some more changes. Review boxes are weird, but that should be it.
